name: Deliverance
description:
A detective by calling, the protagonist, spent his whole life involved in the police force. Famous for his abilities to solve crimes, unravel even the darkest mysteries, and catch the smartest villains. But no more. Things are about to change when he is introduced to a new case filled with symbols, hidden meanings, and a carefully designed, grand plan ready for unveiling.




Can one failure determine your future? Can you really escape from your past or, at some point in time, it’s bound to come back to haunt you?
Maybe every decision you’ve ever made wasn’t yours in the first place? What if you’re just a pawn used for greater things to come? Will you let that happen or stand strong fighting for your loved ones?



Help your hero find purpose again! Meet tempting, beautiful women along the way of your discovery. Shape your personality and explore various relationships. 
Be careful! Each decision can impact your character’s future.
It's up to you to become the hero or the villain.



Deliverance is a completed adult visual novel that features:
  • 16000+ Full HD renders portraying a story with branching paths guaranteeing multiple playthroughs,
  • 650+ Full HD animations,
  • 8 endings,
  • 80 music tracks,
  • Gallery menu that allows you to replay your favorite scenes!
